page.title: 19The Games We Play
page.content: Jimmy and the Stone Snatchers. You need 14 stones. Lay them on the ground. 10 people as the stone snatchers and 1 is Jimmy. When the snatchers pick up the stones, Jimmy has to tig them. You have to take one at a time and you are not supposed to argue over the stones. I play with Sarah, Becky and Craig. My favorite game is hide and seek. Some one counts and 5 people hide. The person who is on counts to 100 in ones, then when the person has counted she/he says come ready or not. By then you should of hidden. If you don't get your dobbie first you are on. 6 people can play hide and seek. I play with Julie Partener. My favorite game is Tig. What you have to do is someone has to count to 10, then they come to catch us.
